explanation: [0-0] A green watermelon lies flat on a white table. It's decorated with red lips, white front teeth, and eyes. Five small bottles filled with different colored liquids are lined up at the top of the screen. On the right side of the watermelon, there's a pair of silver surgical forceps, while on the left, a silver tray holds cotton balls. In the lower left corner of the video, the white subtitle "GOODLAND" appears.

[0-3] As the video begins, a pair of hands appears and puts on blue gloves. The watermelon blinks, then glances sideways as the hands adjust the gloves. The hands pick up a black mobile phone and move it across the surface of the watermelon. The phone screen displays the shadows of two cucumbers inside the watermelon.

[0-3] As the video begins, a pair of hands appears and puts on blue gloves. The watermelon blinks, then glances sideways as the hands adjust the gloves. The hands pick up a black mobile phone and move it across the surface of the watermelon. The phone screen displays the shadows of two cucumbers inside the watermelon.

[0-3] As the video begins, a pair of hands appears and puts on blue gloves. The watermelon blinks, then glances sideways as the hands adjust the gloves. The hands pick up a black mobile phone and move it across the surface of the watermelon. The phone screen displays the shadows of two cucumbers inside the watermelon.

[3-7] The scene then switches to the gloved hands picking up a syringe from a tray filled with various medical supplies. The left hand removes the syringe cap and discards it on the tray. The hands then grab a brown bottle from the five bottles of liquid and insert the syringe into it. The watermelon's eyes widen as it watches the hands draw the liquid from the bottle into the syringe.

The hands then grab a brown bottle from the five bottles of liquid and insert the syringe into it. The watermelon's eyes widen as it watches the hands draw the liquid from the bottle into the syringe.

[7-11] The scene cuts back to the watermelon. The gloved hand inserts the filled syringe into the right side of the watermelon and injects some of the liquid. The watermelon lets out a cry of pain. Next, the syringe is inserted into the left side of the watermelon, and the remaining liquid is injected. The watermelon flattens its mouth and looks away. The syringe is then discarded onto a clean tray.

[11-20] The scene shifts again, showing the gloved hands picking up the surgical forceps as the watermelon watches. The forceps grip a cotton ball, which is then sprayed three times with a spray bottle. The left hand holds the watermelon steady while the right hand uses the cotton ball to repeatedly wipe its surface. The used cotton ball is tossed onto the tray with the empty syringe. The gloved hand picks up a scalpel and uses the forceps to secure the blade in place.

[20-27] The scene returns to the watermelon. The gloved hand pushes the assembled scalpel into the surface of the watermelon, slowly cutting the rind from left to right. After cutting a certain distance, the blade rotates downwards at an angle. The blade is then moved to the left, and the same cut is made, creating a triangular incision in the watermelon's surface. The scalpel is then discarded onto the tray holding the cotton ball and empty syringe.

[27-37] The gloved hand carefully uses two tweezers to remove the cut piece of watermelon rind, revealing two cucumbers inside. The watermelon looks down at its own belly, its mouth forming an "o" shape in surprise. The gloved hand reaches into the watermelon's belly with the tweezers, lifts the end of one cucumber, and removes it with the left hand. The cucumber, with a happy expression, is placed to the side. The hand reaches back in and removes the second cucumber, which has its eyes closed and appears to be unconscious. The gloved hand holds the unconscious cucumber and gently pats its back, but it remains with its eyes closed.

[37-45] The gloved hand places the unconscious cucumber on the white table. Against a white wall, a black mobile phone displays a green horizontal line in the center of its screen. The hands pick up two tin foil defibrillator paddles and rub them together. Black wires are connected to the back of the paddles. After rubbing them together, the paddles are lightly touched to the unconscious cucumber. The first attempt elicits no response. The second rubbing and attempt is also unsuccessful. On the third attempt, after rubbing and lightly touching the unconscious cucumber, the mobile phone against the wall shows a fluctuation. Immediately, the unconscious cucumber opens its eyes and wakes up.
